amendment.description: An amendment numbered 174 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to reduce the salary of Cyrus Salazar (Director of DoD's Office for Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion) to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
